T.query: select md.id as mdid,  d.id as did,  i.id as iid, a.id as aid, s.id as sid from medidata_depots md join depots d on d.medidata_depot_id = md.id join unnumbered_inventory_items i on d.id = i.depot_id join lots l on i.lot_id = l.id join article_types a on l.article_type_id = a.id join studies s on d.study_id = s.id ;

F.query: select md.id as mdid,  d.id as did,  i.id as iid, a.id as aid, s.id as sid from medidata_depots md join depots d on d.medidata_depot_id = md.id join unnumbered_inventory_items i on d.id = i.depot_id join lots l on i.lot_id = l.id right join article_types a on l.article_type_id = a.id join studies s on d.study_id = s.id ;

select md.id as mdid,  d.id as did,  i.id as iid, a.id as aid, s.id as sid from medidata_depots md join depots d on d.parent_id = md.id join unnumbered_inventory_items i on d.id = i.depot_id join lots l on i.lot_id = l.id join article_types a on l.article_type_id = a.id join studies s on d.study_id = s.id ;

select md.id as mdid,  d.id as did,  i.id as iid, a.id as aid, s.id as sid from medidata_depots md join depots d on d.medidata_depot_id = md.id and d.parent_id = md.id join unnumbered_inventory_items i on d.id = i.depot_id join lots l on i.lot_id = l.id join article_types a on l.article_type_id = a.id join studies s on d.study_id = s.id ;

select md.id as mdid,  d.id as did,  i.id as iid, a.id as aid, s.id as sid from medidata_depots md join depots d on d.medidata_depot_id = md.id and d.parent_id = md.id join unnumbered_inventory_items i on d.id = i.depot_id join lots l on i.lot_id = l.id right join article_types a on l.article_type_id = a.id join studies s on d.study_id = s.id ;
